Literature.Title: De Novo Designed Hexadecapeptides Synergize Glycopeptide Antibiotics Vancomycin and Teicoplanin against Pathogenic Klebsiella pneumoniae via Disruption of Cell Permeability and Potential
Literature.Author: Zeng P, Xu C, Liu C, Liu J, Cheng Q, Gao W, Yang X, Chen S, Chan KF, Wong KY

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:25% Killing=128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15692(MIC=>128µM),Salmonella typhimurium PY1(MIC=32µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 78578(MIC=>128µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=2µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 1717(MIC=32µM),Morganella morganii(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=16µM),Citrobacter freundii(MIC=4µM),Klebsiella oxytoca(MIC=>128µM),Enterobacter cloacae(MIC=64µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae KP1088(MIC=128µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae KP04(MIC=>128µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae KP14(MIC=>128µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae KP94(MIC=64µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae KP98(MIC=>128µM)
